OAI1.title: Office of Outreach, Access, and Inclusion
OAI1.description: Design, update, and facilitate maintenance of OAI sites. Circulate a weekly newsletter for an audience of nearly 100 transfer students in the S-STEM Pathways to Engineering Collaborative.

OAI2.title: Office of Outreach, Access, and Inclusion
OAI2.description: Instructed five summer programs and collaborated with colleagues to develop material on Raspberry Pi, Python, R, & Onshape for 100+ middle to college level students with underrepresented backgrounds. Provided guidance, mentorship, and a sense of community.
